column5: hit one of my fav spots in brantford for eyes last nite, did pretty well, biggest was around 4 smallest was pound in a half, it seems the vibrax spinners were producing more than the jigs and other baits last nite, got 4 eyes in total between three guys, started at 10 till 1am. heading back out ton i'll post another report wen i get  back cheers.
Pic,s Happy fishing ta ya. Thanks for the report.
Spinners are great pickerel lures at night, over weeds especially. Thanks for the report.  Where's the pictures??
Sounds like its the right time to get em don't forget to take some pics nerxt time out

Thanks for sharing that. I'm gonna have to try that...gonna go to CT and get a Glow Mepps. I am on a lake that seems to shut down for walleye as soon as it gets dark...its very muddy lake....but i always heard walleye fishing is good at night.....i'm wondering whether your tactic might prove fruitful...ty for the tip.
ya tributaryhunter and i went out again and caught a few more, we need to start to bring the camera but it is just a nuesinse when u wade out in the water.
hey limeyangler in that muddy water try a black vibrax or any kind of black lure it seems to work good for me in those kinda conditions tight lines
where abouts on the grand are u guys fishin? i've never been out that wayy
we fish in brantford just walk the river and u will find the right areas .i can think of 10 different spots in brantford to fish for decent sizes
